00023 #include "BurstApplLayer.h"
00024 
00025 #include "ApplPkt_m.h"
00026 
00027 using std::endl;
00028 
00029 Define_Module(BurstApplLayer);
00030 
00031 // do some initialization
00032 void BurstApplLayer::initialize(int stage)
00033 {
00034     TestApplLayer::initialize(stage);
00035 
00036     if(stage==0){
00037         if(hasPar("burstSize"))
00038             burstSize = par("burstSize");
00039         else
00040             burstSize = 3;
00041         if(hasPar("burstReply"))
00042           bSendReply = par("burstReply");
00043         else
00044           bSendReply = true;
00045     }
00046 }
00047 
00048 
00049 void BurstApplLayer::handleSelfMsg(cMessage *msg)
00050 {
00051     switch(msg->getKind())
00052     {
00053     case SEND_BROADCAST_TIMER:
00054         for(int i=0; i<burstSize; i++) {
00055             sendBroadcast();
00056         }
00057         break;
00058     default:
00059         EV <<" Unkown selfmessage! -> delete, kind: "<<msg->getKind()<<endl;
00060         break;
00061     }
00062 }
00063 
00071 void BurstApplLayer::handleLowerMsg( cMessage* msg )
00072 {
00073   if ( !bSendReply && msg->getKind() == BROADCAST_MESSAGE) {
00074     ApplPkt *m  = static_cast<ApplPkt *>(msg);
00075     coreEV << "Received a broadcast packet from host["<<m->getSrcAddr()<<"] -> delete message, no reply" << endl;
00076     delete msg;
00077     return;
00078   }
00079   TestApplLayer::handleLowerMsg(msg);
00080 }
